metadata.title: MASiVE: Mapping and analysis of Sirevirus elements in plant genome sequences
metadata.abstract: Summary: We present MASiVE, an expertly built tool for the large-scale, yet sensitive and highly accurate, discovery, preliminary analysis and insertion age estimation of intact Sirevirus LTRretrotransposons in plant genomic sequences. Validation was based on the recently available and annotated large maize chromosome one. Results show a considerable improvement in the annotation of Sireviruses, and support our approach as an important addition to the bioinformatics toolbox of plant biologists. © The Author 2010. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.

description: Mapping and Analysis of SIreVirus Elements is an expertly-built tool for the large-scale, yet sensitive and highly accurate, discovery, preliminary analysis, and insertion age estimation of intact Sirevirus LTR-retrotransposons in plant genomic sequences.
name: MASiVE
